snippet: CBS programming went dark for Dish subscribers in New York, Los Angeles, Chicago and several other markets after six months of talks failed.
abstract: CBS programming goes dark for Dish Network subscribers in several markets after broadcaster and satellite television provider fail to resolve six-month contract negotiation standoff.
lead_paragraph: CBS programming went dark for Dish subscribers in New York, Los Angeles, Chicago and several other markets after six months of talks failed.

headline.main: CBS Shuts Off Programming for Dish Network
headline.print_headline: CBS Pulls Programming in Dish Network Dispute
